title: THUG - Motion Set
description: 'THUG' motion set - your go-to for raw street-style melee and blunt force action in Unreal Engine.
longDescription:
Elevate your Unreal Engine projects with our meticulously crafted "THUG" motion set. This comprehensive package is designed to infuse your games and simulations with unparalleled realism and dynamic action, bringing your digital worlds to life.


Product Overview:

Our THUG motion set is the culmination of extensive research and state-of-the-art motion capture technology, aimed at delivering high-quality animations for a street thug character involved in melee and blunt force combat, as well as nuanced movement. It provides Unreal Engine developers with a versatile toolkit to create compelling, action-packed scenes and character interactions. This pack contains 52 hand edited animations crafted using standard practices for game development - Pose Matching starts and ends, Root Motion for each animation following correct Axis and animations cleaned and enhanced in editing.


Watch the Animation Breakdown here:

https://youtu.be/Hwkv5spE_ic
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Recorded with our XSENS suit and edited in Motionbuilder
  •  52 hand edited animations to bring the THUG character alive.
  •  Can be used for any type of game, first person, third person, even RTS (looks nice at an angle thanks to the pose of the character, give it a try!)

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

IK bones are included: Yes - IK HandGun Bone contains all weapon movement for easy weapon setup.

Number of Animations: 52

Animation types: Root Motion

Supported Development Platforms:

All development platforms are supported

Documentation: Animation List

Important/Additional Notes: All animations are pose matched to either an idle pose, or weapon ready pose. All root motion is authored to loop correctly in the desired motion trajectory.

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
First release - v1
Contains 52 animations - Movement, Melee, Blocking, Get Hit, Taunts
